Posts.Content: Apr 7, 2018 03:56AM Midnightrain wrote: I know how you feel. I had a mammogram and ultrasound on April 3rd. The radiologist showed me one area of concern but said she is confident it’s benign. They classified it as BIRAD 4a. Since I am low priority I am schedule for core needle biopsy end of the month April 27th. And then follow up every 6 months for 2 years. I am only 34. Little stressful waiting.
Posts.Title: Waiting on Biopsy Result AlyssaRN4 mommakat
